text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: During training...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Hello. I hope you don't mind.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ehh?! B-Bourbon?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: She's going to be your training<n>partner.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: She's going to be your training<n>partner.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Just for today, we are teammates. If<n>you'll have me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Umm...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Rice, the training I'm accustomed to<n>is, according to others,
"demonic".

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
But seeing as you've defeated me<n>before, you should be
able to keep up.<n>Let's make today worth it.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hwehh!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No, not "hweh." Now then, let us<n>begin. First up, four uphill
dashes.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: O-okay!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Rice takes off running as if being<n>hounded by Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
...Well, I'd better get to it myself. The<n>Tenno Sho is nearly
upon us.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I simply cannot wait to run alongside<n>Rice. Aren't you
excited too, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: McQueen looks at me with a wry<n>smile.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I take that to mean I'd better<n>convince Rice to compete.
choice_data_list: She'll run. I'll make sure of it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, I trust that you will.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, say what? Rice is gonna be in<n>the Tenno Sho too?!
Oh boy, I gotta get<n>the word out!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
H-hey, what are you—? Wait just a<n>minute! This isn't
supposed to be<n>public yet!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Our special training session gets off<n>to a lively start.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
As I expected, you've kept up with<n>my "demonic" training.
And now for<n>the final exercise.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Rice, I want you to race me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? ...Race you?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
You bested me in the Kikuka Sho. It<n>shouldn't be an
unreasonable task.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: But, but I...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Having seen such a powerful<n>performance from you, I find
your<n>timidness rather unexpected.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
In the Kikuka Sho, you had me in your<n>sights from the start,
and never let me<n>escape for even a second.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: You worked hard to beat me, and<n>your running showed it.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: And now, I am working hard in order<n>to beat you.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
However... In your current state, I<n>won't actually need to
work hard at all<n>to win.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I don't want that. The Rice I know<n>isn't someone I could
best without<n>putting in the work.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: So run, Rice.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Just like you did in that race, show<n>me that you want to win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Want... to win...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I love running... but I just can't seem<n>to win. And when I
see McQueen<n>race—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I... I want to win too!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...That's right. That's the whole<n>reason why I switched
teams, why I<n>trained so hard...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Even if some people don't like it<n>when I win, I... I want...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I want to win!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I see you've finally found your drive<n>again. Well then, let's
finish our<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Okay!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh? Rice and Bourbon are going at it!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Rice is keeping her eyes forward<n>now.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: She remembered why she wants towin—who she wants to winagainst.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: She remembered why she wants towin—who she wants to winagainst.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Indeed.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: All right, I'm gonna go be their ref!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (She's so fast! Faster than in the<n>Kikuka Sho...)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (She trained hard... because shewanted to win against me.)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (The crowd refused to recognize me,<n>but she did.)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: (And I can't let her down!)

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yahhh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I see that same ambition she exuded<n>in the Kikuka Sho. The
drive to win<n>pushes her forward.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: There it is! Rice Shower wins!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Rice, you ran well. Even better than<n>you did in the Kikuka
Sho.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Bourbon... I did it... I remembered what<n>it was like to want to
win against you.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
And I was able to see your running<n>firsthand again. It
seems I have much<n>more training to do.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Our next meeting will be in the<n>Twinkle Series... as
unparalleled rivals.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah... Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Trainer, I, um... I'll run in the Tenno<n>Sho!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I want to win. Even if it's an<n>important race for McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Heh. I wouldn't have it any other<n>way.
choice_data_list: Then we'd better get training, yeah?

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Rice has decided to rise to the<n>challenge once more. The
Tenno Sho<n>awaits.
